00017 // maximum curvature and derivative of curvature
00018 double KappaMax = 1.0; //0.2;
00019 double SigmaMax = 1.0; //0.05;
00020 
00021 // start configuration
00022 SMT_Configuration start (0, 0, 0, 0);
00023 // end configuration
00024 SMT_Configuration goal (1, 1, 0.785, 0);
00025 
00026 
00027 // ############################################################################
00028 int main(int argc, char **argv)

00030   char *message;

00032   // set goal configuration
00033   cout << "***** CC-Steer *****\n";
00034   printf ("Start Config. = (%.2f, %.2f, %.2f, %.2f)\n", 
00035           start.x, start.y, start.theta, start.kappa);
00036   cout << "Enter Goal Config.\n";
00037   cout << "x = ";
00038   cin >> goal.x;
00039   cout << "y = ";
00040   cin >> goal.y;
00041   cout << "theta = ";
00042   cin >> goal.theta;
00043   cout << "kappa = ";
00044   cin >> goal.kappa;
00045   printf ("Goal Config. = (%.2f, %.2f, %.2f, %.2f)\n", 
00046           goal.x, goal.y, goal.theta, goal.kappa);
00047 
00048   // compute cc-dubins path
00049   SMT_CC_Dubins_Path *d_path;
00050   
00051   d_path = cc_dubins (start, goal, KappaMax, SigmaMax);
00052   d_path->print (true);         // alphanumeric display
00053 
00054   // compute cc-reeds-shepp path
00055   SMT_CC_RS_Path *rs_path;
00056 
00057   rs_path = cc_reeds_shepp (start, goal, 1, 1);

00059 }
